sentence.Network_en: It's beluga, the best caviar in the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是白海豚, 全世界最好的鱼子酱.

sentence.Network_en: Check out this four - year - old boy swimming with the beluga whale.
sentence.Network_cn: 证实一下,一个4 岁 大的小男孩与一条白鲸一起游泳.

sentence.Network_en: A beluga whale swims in a tank at the Vancouver Aquarium.
sentence.Network_cn: 一头白色大鳇鱼或叫大白鲸在北美洲的范库弗峰水族馆里游弋着.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from Russian belukha (sense 1), beluga (sense 2), both from belyǐibreve; 'white'

means.word_mean: 1. valuable source of caviar and isinglass; found in Black and Caspian seas
2. small northern whale that is white when adult
